Dina Recanati (onye amụrụ Diane Hettena; 1928 - 5 June 2021) bụ onye Israel na-ese ihe, onye na-akpụ ihe ọkpụkpụ na onye na-eme eserese.
A mụrụ Diane Hettena na Cairo, Egypt
N'afọ 1946, ọ lụrụ Raphael Recanati na Tel Aviv, Mandatory Palestine.
Recanati mepụtara ihe owuwu, ihe osise silkscreen, ihe ndị e sere ese, na tapestries.
Recanati nwụrụ na Herzliya Pituah mgbe ọ dị afọ iri itoolu na ato.
